text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/who-smart-hiv-dak/CodeSystem/concept-codes
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    HIV.C.DE37No condom use during sex with more than one partner in the past 6 monthsSigns of substantial risk of HIV infection - No condom use during sex with more than one partner in the past 6 months
    HIV.C.DE38STI in the past 6 monthsSigns of substantial risk of HIV infection - STI in the past 6 months
    HIV.C.DE39A sexual partner in the past 6 months had one or more HIV risk factorsSigns of substantial risk of HIV infection - A sexual partner in the past 6 months had one or more HIV risk factors
    HIV.C.DE40PrEP requested by clientSigns of substantial risk of HIV infection - PrEP requested by client
    HIV.E.DE156No condom use during sex with more than one partner in the past 6 monthsSigns of substantial risk of HIV infection - No condom use during sex with more than one partner in the past 6 months
    HIV.E.DE157STI in the past 6 monthsSigns of substantial risk of HIV infection - STI in the past 6 months
    HIV.E.DE158A sexual partner in the past 6 months had one or more HIV risk factorsSigns of substantial risk of HIV infection - A sexual partner in the past 6 months had one or more HIV risk factors
    HIV.E.DE159PrEP requested by clientSigns of substantial risk of HIV infection - PrEP requested by client

name: SignsofsubstantialriskofHIVinfectionCodes
title: Signs of substantial risk of HIV infection Codes
description: Codes representing possible values for the Signs of substantial risk of HIV infection element
